isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - PRINCIPLES, OPERATION AND SERVICE - OPERATION - ENGINE BRAKE

svcproc.title: ENGINE BRAKE
svcproc.para: With electronic engines, the ABS electronic controller is connected to the engine ECM through the J1922 Data Link. The electronic controller sends a signal indicating a possible wheel lockup, and the engine ECM disables the engine brake.
With the Caterpillar 3406C mechanical engine, the ABS controller uses an Engine Brake Relay to turn OFF the power to the engine brake system.
